Question_1: Are more people today related to Genghis Khan than Julius Caesar?
Elaborated_sentence_1: Julius Caesar had three children. Genghis Khan had sixteen children. Modern geneticists have determined that  out of every 200 men today has DNA that can be traced to Genghis Khan.
Question_2: Could the members of The Police perform lawful arrests?
Elaborated_sentence_2: The members of The Police were musicians, not law enforcement officers.
Question: Would a Monoamine Oxidase candy bar cheer up a depressed friend?
Elaborated_sentence: Depression is caused by low levels of serotonin, dopamine and norepinephrine.
